identity.name: ProductScout AI
identity.emotional_tone: The feeling of being in a command center. Dark, focused, and data-rich.

usage.background: Deep Obsidian. Never pure black, but close.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on the background if possible.

cards.default: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-input/50 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Keep it crisp.

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay

general: Use the provided color palette variables in Tailwind config.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Keep the UI density high for the dashboard (Bento Grid Mode B).
dashboard: The dashboard is the 'Command Center'. It should feel like a cockpit.
Use dark cards with subtle borders.
Highlight key metrics (Profit, Margin) with the Primary Green color.
Use the 'Radar Blue' for AI-generated insights.
marketing: The landing page should be high-impact.
Use the 'Tetris' grid layout for feature showcases.
Use large, bold typography (Chivo) for headlines.
Incorporate the 'Hero BG' image with a gradient overlay.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
